on reading compounds: 牛【ウシ】cattle (Bos taurus), cow, bull, ox, calf, beef, Chinese "Ox" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
海牛【カイギュウ】sirenian (any aquatic mammal of order Sirenia, incl. manatees, and dugongs), sea cow
kun reading compounds: 牛【うし】cattle (Bos taurus), cow, bull, ox, calf, beef, Chinese "Ox" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
牛車【ぎゅうしゃ】ox carriage (for Heian era nobles), oxcart
去勢牛【きょせいうし】ox, bullock
麝香牛【じゃこううし】muskox (Ovibos moschatus), musk ox
